title: Росфинмониторинг внес фонд "Свободная Россия" в список террористов и экстремистов
cleaned_sentences: The Federal Financial Monitoring Service (Rosfinmonitoring) was introduced by the Free Russia Foundation Foundation in the list of terrorists and extremists.
This follows from the document on the website of the department.
More than 50 nationalist and separatist movements were included in the list of terrorists and extremists.
Their activities are prohibited in Russia.
Earlier, the Ministry of Justice included the Free Russia Foundation, created in the United States, in the list of prohibited in Russia due to extremist activities.
It is known that Free Russia was created in 2014 by a group of Russian emigrants in Washington.
The fund is part of the structural unit of the "anti -Russian separatist movement" (recognized as extremist and is prohibited in Russia).
